commit.message: Renaming 'password reset' to 'password management', adding 'request password reset' and translating the italian floating menu entries

files.patch:
@@ -64,7 +64,8 @@ public enum ActionType {
         SEARCH("search"),
         DELETE("delete"),
         EXECUTE("execute"),
-        PASSWORD_RESET("update"),
+        PASSWORD_MANAGEMENT("update"),
+        REQUEST_PASSWORD_RESET("update"),
         DRYRUN("execute"),
         CLAIM("claim"),
         SELECT("read"),
